revision.comment: Lang section formatting (wrong order, missing dividers, category placement)
revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{suffix|en|Xavier|ian}}, after St. Francis Xavier. ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # A member of the [[w:Xaverian Brothers|Xaverian Brothers]], a [[religious order]] founded in Bruges, Belgium 1839 and dedicated to [[Catholic]] [[education]]. ===Adjective=== {{en-adj}} # Pertaining or related to this religious order. [[Category:English eponyms]] {{C|en|Roman Catholicism}}
